review_data.title: Go for the Balkavas and reserve a traditional afghani seating!

review_data.content: Hello Tripasvisors! The food was okay, but too expensive, to little and took to long time. Will not recommend! Kind regards, Afghan family from Norway

review_data.title: You need to see this!
review_data.content: The restaurant Afghan Anar has the old afghanian culture in their restaurant, in the food and in the construction! They created the restaurant perfectly, so you have a great experience there!

review_data.title: Unique design
review_data.content: The design of the place is unique: Small tables. Cushions. Direct view to the kitchen. Several photos on the wall from Afghanistan. Small, round lamps in several colours. Try the aubergines.

review_data.content: Cosy little place with healthy and tasty menu, very affordable prices and super friendly staff. Been there twice for lunch and will definitely go again.
